# Definition for a binary tree node.# class TreeNode:#     def __init__(self, x):#         self.val = x#         self.left = None#         self.right = None# é€’å½’class Solution:    def mirrorTree(self, root: TreeNode) -> TreeNode:        if not root:            return        root.left, root.right = root.right, root.left        self.mirrorTree(root.left)        self.mirrorTree(root.right)        return root# è¿­ä»£class Solution:    def mirrorTree(self, root: TreeNode) -> TreeNode:        if not root:            return        node_list = [root]        while node_list:            cur_node = node_list.pop()            if cur_node.left:                node_list.append(cur_node.left)            if cur_node.right:                node_list.append(cur_node.right)            cur_node.left, cur_node.right =  cur_node.right, cur_node.left        return root

# ä¸»ä½“æ¡†æ¶class UnionFind(object):    # åˆå§‹åŒ–    def __init__(self):        pass    # æŸ¥è¯¢æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹    def find(self):        pass    # åˆå¹¶èŠ‚ç‚¹    def union(self):        pass    # åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦è¿é€š    def is_same_set(self):        pass

    def __init__(self, M):    self.father_dict = {}    # è®°å½•é›†åˆçš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬ä¸ºè¿”å›å€¼    self.nums_set = 0    for i in range(len(M)):        if i not in self.father_dict:            self.father_dict[i] = None            # é›†åˆçš„æ•°é‡+1            self.nums_set += 1

    def find(self, x):    root = x    while self.father_dict[root] != None:        root = self.father_dict[root]    # è·¯å¾„å‹ç¼©    while x != root:        cur_father = self.father_dict[x]        self.father_dict[x] = root        x = cur_father    return root

    def union(self, a, b):    a_root, b_root = self.find(a), self.find(b)    # ä»»æ„æŒ‡å®šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹    if a_root != b_root:        self.father_dict[a_root] = b_root        self.nums_set -= 1

entry.content: # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Time    : 2020/11/20 11:33# @Author  : Wanghairui# @function:from functools import wrapsimport loggingdef _create_logger():    logger = logging.getLogger('LogError')    logger.setLevel(logging.ERROR)    file_handler = logging.FileHandler(r'./MJlogs.log')    log_format = '%(levelname)s %(asctime)s %(message)s'    formatter = logging.Formatter(log_format)    file_handler.setFormatter(formatter)    logger.addHandler(file_handler)    return loggerdef logged(func):    @wraps(func)    def do_logging(*args, **kwargs):        try:            return func(*args, **kwargs)        except Exception as e:            logger = _create_logger()            error_msg = 'And error has occurred at /' + func.__name__ + '\n'            logger.exception(error_msg)            return e    return do_logging

entry.title: Pythonç”Ÿäº§è€…æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¨¡å‹
entry.content: import timeimport queueimport threadingclass ThreadProductorConsumer():    # åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¨¡å‹    def __init__(self):        # å¤§å°ä¸º15çš„ç¼“å†²æ± ï¼Œç”¨äºå®¹çº³äº§å“        self.q = queue.Queue(15)        self.screen_lock = threading.Semaphore(value=1)    def productor(self, product):        # ç”Ÿäº§è€…ä¸åœçš„æ¯3ç§’ç”Ÿäº§ä¸€ä¸ªäº§å“        while True:            self.q.put(product)            cur_time = time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', time.localtime(time.time()))            cur_name = threading.current_thread().name            # printæ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„,éœ€è¦ä¿¡å·é‡ç¡®ä¿æ²¡æœ‰å†²çª            self.screen_lock.acquire()            print(cur_time+"  " + cur_name + " ç”Ÿäº§äº†ä¸€ä¸ªäº§å“", sep='\n')            self.screen_lock.release()            time.sleep(3)    def consumer(self):        # æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ä¸åœçš„æ¯2ç§’æ¶ˆè´¹ä¸€ä¸ªäº§å“        while True:            self.q.get()            cur_time = time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', time.localtime(time.time()))            cur_name = threading.current_thread().name            self.screen_lock.acquire()            print(cur_time + "  " + cur_name + " æ¶ˆè´¹äº†ä¸€ä¸ªäº§å“", sep='\n')            self.screen_lock.release()            time.sleep(2)if __name__ == "__main__":    tpc = ThreadProductorConsumer()    p = "product"    # å®ä¾‹åŒ–äº†3ä¸ªç”Ÿäº§è€…    for i in range(3):        t = threading.Thread(target=tpc.productor, args=(p,))        t.start()    # å®ä¾‹åŒ–äº†6ä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…    for j in range(6):        v = threading.Thread(target=tpc.consumer)        v.start()

entry.content: # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Time    : 2020/10/12 12:03# @Author  : Wanghairuiimport asyncioimport timeasync def main():    # æ§åˆ¶å¹¶å‘æ•° 20    sem = asyncio.Semaphore(20)    tasks = [asyncio.create_task(print_something("c"+str(i), sem)) for i in range(60)]    start = time.perf_counter()    await asyncio.gather(*tasks)    print("è¿è¡Œç»“æŸ")    res = [t.result() for t in tasks]    print(res)    elapsed = (time.perf_counter() - start)    print(elapsed)async def print_something(thing, sem):    async with sem:        print(thing)        await asyncio.sleep(3)    return "A"if __name__ == "__main__":    asyncio.run(main())

/** * @author Mr.wang * @date 2019-11-07 15:07 * function_: */public class InsertSort {    public static void insertSort(int [] list){        for(int i = 1;i < list.length; i++){            int tmp = list[i];            int k;            //å°†æ¯”ç°åœ¨å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ å‘åç§»            for(k = i; k > 0 && list[k-1] > tmp; k--){                list[k] = list[k - 1];            }            list[k] = tmp;        }    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        int [] list = {29,10,14,37,14};        insertSort(list);        for(int a : list){            System.out.print(a+" ");        }    }}

/** * @author Mr.wang * @date 2019-11-07 09:11 * function_:å½’å¹¶æ’åº */public class MergeSort {    public static void main(String[] args){        MergeSort m = new MergeSort();        int[] a = {11,44,23,67,88,65,34,48,9,12};        int[] tmp = new int[a.length];        m.mergeSort(a, 0, a.length - 1, tmp);        for(int n : a){            System.out.print(n + " ");        }    }    public void merge(int[] a, int left, int mid, int right, int[] tmp){        int le = left;        int m = mid + 1;        int i = 0;        while (le <= mid && m <= right){            if (a[le] < a[m]){                tmp[i++] = a[le++];            }            else{                tmp[i++] = a[m++];            }        }        //å½“å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹ä»æœ‰å‰©ä½™æ—¶        while (le <= mid){            tmp[i++] = a[le++];        }        while (m <= right){            tmp[i++] = a[m++];        }        //å¤åˆ¶å›åŸæ•°ç»„        for (int j = 0; j < i; j++){            a[left+j] = tmp[j];        }    }    public void mergeSort(int[] a,int start, int end,int[] tmp){        if(start < end){            int mid = (start + end) / 2;            mergeSort(a, start, mid, tmp);            mergeSort(a, mid + 1, end, tmp);            merge(a, start, mid, end,tmp);        }        System.out.print("");    }}

class Solution {    public int mySqrt(int x) {       long a = x;       while (a * a > x){           a = (a + x / a) / 2 ;       }    return (int)a;    }}

class MyCircularQueue {    private int[] data;    private int head;    private int tail;    private int size;    /** Initialize your data structure here. Set the size of the queue to be k. */    public MyCircularQueue(int k) {        data = new int[k];        head = -1;        tail = -1;        size = k;    }    /** Insert an element into the circular queue. Return true if the operation is successful. */    public boolean enQueue(int value) {        if (isFull() == true) {            return false;        }        if (isEmpty() == true) {            head = 0;        }        tail = (tail + 1) % size;        data[tail] = value;        return true;    }    /** Delete an element from the circular queue. Return true if the operation is successful. */    public boolean deQueue() {        if (isEmpty() == true) {            return false;        }        if (head == tail) {            head = -1;            tail = -1;            return true;        }        head = (head + 1) % size;        return true;    }    /** Get the front item from the queue. */    public int Front() {        if (isEmpty() == true) {            return -1;        }        return data[head];    }    /** Get the last item from the queue. */    public int Rear() {        if (isEmpty() == true) {            return -1;        }        return data[tail];    }    /** Checks whether the circular queue is empty or not. */    public boolean isEmpty() {        return head == -1;    }    /** Checks whether the circular queue is full or not. */    public boolean isFull() {        return ((tail + 1) % size) == head;    }}/** * Your MyCircularQueue object will be instantiated and called as such: * MyCircularQueue obj = new MyCircularQueue(k); * boolean param_1 = obj.enQueue(value); * boolean param_2 = obj.deQueue(); * int param_3 = obj.Front(); * int param_4 = obj.Rear(); * boolean param_5 = obj.isEmpty(); * boolean param_6 = obj.isFull(); */

public boolean Find(int target, int [][] array) {        if(array == null||array.length == 0){            return false;        }        int left = 0;        int bottom = array.length - 1;        int right = array[0].length - 1;        while(bottom >= 0 && left <= right){            if(target > array[bottom][left]){                left++;            }            else if(target < array[bottom][left]){                bottom--;            }            else{                return true;            }        }        return false;    }

/** * @author Mr.wang * @date 2019-04-24 20:35 */public class BST {    private Node root;          //äºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘çš„æ ¹ç»“ç‚¹    private class Node{        int val;        private Node left;        private Node right;        public Node(int val, Node left, Node right){            this.val = val;            this.left = left;            this.right = right;        }    }    /**     * æŸ¥æ‰¾     * --é€’å½’å®ç°     */    public Node FindByRec(int value){        return FindByRec(root,value);    }    private Node FindByRec(Node node, int value){        if(root == null){            return null;        }        if(root.val > value){            return FindByRec(root.right, value);        }        else if(root.val < value){            return FindByRec(root.left, value);        }        else{            return node;        }    }    /*    *æŸ¥æ‰¾    * éé€’å½’    */    public Node FindByFuc(int value){        return FindByFuc(root, value);    }    private Node FindByFuc(Node node, int value){        while (node != null){            if(node.val > value){                  node = node.left;            }            else if(node.val < value){                node = node.right;            }            else{                return node;            }        }        return node;    }}
